official-title.#text:
To increase the number of tenant-based rental assistance
		  vouchers made available for low-income families displaced by Hurricane
		  Sandy.

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committees on

, for a period
			 to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of
			 such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee
			 concerned

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following
			 bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text:
Safely Sheltering Disaster Victims Act
			 of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Transfer of amounts to
			 provide tenant-based rental assistance for low-income families displaced by
			 Hurricane Sandy

quote.#text:
Department of Housing and Urban Development—Community Planning and
			 Development—Community Development Fund

quote.#tail:
for an additional amount for the
			 activities and assistance provided in this section.
quote.#text:
Department of Housing and Urban Development—Public and Indian
			 Housing—Tenant-Based Rental Assistance

text.#text: Of the amounts made available for

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
,
			 $50,000,000, to remain available until expended, is hereby transferred to

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
title VIII of the Disaster
			 Relief Appropriations Act, 2013

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be used only for activities and assistance
			 for the provision of tenant-based rental assistance, including related
			 administrative expenses, authorized under the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Safely Sheltering Disaster Victims Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to areas impacted by Hurricane Sandy, subject to the
			 following requirements:

shall be
			 made available for such tenant-based rental assistance not later than the
			 expiration of the 60-day period that begins on the date of the enactment of
			 this Act.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Safely Sheltering Disaster Victims Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

text.#text:
In carrying out the activities
			 authorized under this heading, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 8(o)(13)(B) of
			 the United States Housing Act of 1937

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may be provided
			 only to public housing agencies that agree to provide a preference, pursuant to
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Safely Sheltering Disaster Victims Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: available to eligible families displaced by Hurricane Sandy.
, for making tenant-based assistance under such

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 8(o)(6)(A) of the United States Housing Act of 1937

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may be used only
			 for tenant-based rental assistance for families that are otherwise eligible for
			 such assistance under the terms of the program for such assistance under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Safely Sheltering Disaster Victims Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 8(o) of the United States Housing Act of 1937

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may continue to receive such assistance after the transferred
			 amounts are no longer available for such assistance, subject to the eligibility
			 of such family and the availability of amounts for such assistance made
			 available in appropriation Acts.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Safely Sheltering Disaster Victims Act of 2013/s:2/ss:a

text.#text:
An eligible family
			 that is provided tenant-based rental assistance with amounts transferred by
